subject: Iracing matching issues
description_text:
Hello guys, I have a little problems with the Plus X pedals, Iracing
recognize the brake pedals perfectly but nothing for the gas pedal, the gas
pedal working perfectly on the simsonn manager, but impossible to recognize
it and then calibrate it on Iracing.
Any suggestions or idea to help me ?
Thanks

conversations.body_text: Hi adrian michau,  Have you completed the pedal calibration? To help us diagnose the issue, could you please provide a video showing all three pedals being pressed from 0% to 100% as displayed in the software? Additionally, please include a video of the key binding screen in iRacing. Thank you!
ID 为 1239 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单1239  
      主题: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN1690, how did it go?  
      描述:  Sorry about the late answer, the issue was nothing just a computer restart and everything is fine, the pedals are perfect, really happy about my purchase thanks a lot  
  
 Le sam. 5 juil. 2025, 14:18, SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> a écrit : 
 
 
 
 
 Hello Adrian,  We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel.
